cast.overview: For never-do-well compulsive gambler Fong, there's only one thing more fearsome than debtors at his doorstep - having to coax a crying baby. But what if the baby becomes his golden goose to fend off his debtors? Can he overcome his phobia of diapers, milk bottles, and cloying lullabies?
cast.title: Rob-B-Hood

crew.overview: A music-loving kinkajou named Vivo embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.
crew.title: Vivo

crew.overview: Garfield, the world-famous, Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure! After an unexpected reunion with his long-lost father – scruffy street cat Vic – Garfield and his canine friend Odie are forced from their perfectly pampered life into joining Vic in a hilarious, high-stakes heist.
crew.title: The Garfield Movie

crew.overview: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.
crew.title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines

also_known_as: กู่เทียนเล่อ
details.biography: Louis Koo Tin-Lok (Chinese: 古天樂; born 21 October 1970) is a Hong Kong actor and movie producer. He shot to fame doing television dramas with Hong Kong's TVB network. Since the 2000s, he has focused entirely on film. The actor works closely with Hong Kong-based directors such as Johnnie To and Benny Chan, and has set up his own movie production company in 2013. One Cool Group, a film production company that has become a major player in the Asian film industry. He is also the president of the Hong Kong Performing Artistes Guild and the Federation of Hong Kong Filmmakers. A well-known figure of Hong Kong cinema including investor, and entrepreneur.
details.name: Louis Koo
details.place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
